jdbcService.sql: insert into node ( id, db_created_utc, db_modified_utc, owner_id, published_utc, verified, enabled, parent_id, name, title, description, comment, version, context, latitude, longitude, language, assigned_role_id, component_id, priority ) values ( :id, timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), :ownerId, :publishedUtc, :verified, :enabled, :parentId, :name, :title, :description, :comment, :version, :context, :latitude, :longitude, :language, :assignedRoleId, :componentId, :priority )
